Hello, Why does my screen go black when i start the game up and say out of timing. I can hear the game running but have no picture. Ive messed about with resolution settings etc but still won't work. I'm running xp x64 sp2 with 256mb nvidia GeForce 7025 graphics card ,8Gb ram, 2.8Ghz processor.
downloaded and installed less than 15 minutes, great copy, thanks a lot!!!
Great game!  Verifying that it works! Thank you uploader!

For all the peeps having that black screen problem on Roller Coaster Tycoon 3 Platinum, try editing the Options.txt file on the following path (for Vista):

C:\Users\\AppData\Roaming\Atari\RCT3

Open the file using Notepad, then change the Resolution in the first line to 1024 768 or 800 600.

Save the file and now try to run the game. It should work fine.

XP Users can find the Options.txt file on the following path:

C:\Documents and Settings\\Application Data\Atari\RCT3

You may have to enable the "Show Hidden Files and Folders" option in Folder Options first as Application Data/AppData is a hidden folder.

Thank you CarlesNeo for this amazing upload. Thumbs Up.

This is how the file reads (the Resolution portion is at the top as you can see):

Resolution 1024 768
TemperatureUnits 0
StaticBatchTriCutoff 80
DynamicBatchTriCutoff 200
GraphicsQuality 4
CycleMenuMusic 6
MusicVolume 0.000000
GuestLOD 2.100000 1.350000
AnimalLOD 2.100000 1.350000
VegetationLOD 2.100000 1.350000
FenceLOD 2.100000 1.350000
BuildingLOD 2.100000 1.350000

SceneryLOD 2.100000 1.350000
SupportLOD 2.100000 1.350000
TrackLOD 2.100000 1.350000
RideLOD 2.100000 1.350000
GeometryImposterDistance 400.000000
GeometryImposterTolerance 0.300000
SkipCacheWarming 3.000000
Brightness 0.131250
ReflectEnable 1
WaterBumpEnable 1
ReflectTerrain 1
ReflectScenery 1
ReflectPeople 1
ReflectAnimals 1
ReflectParticles 1
BlendSceneryLODs 1
EnableIME 0
DetailMapTerrain 0
BackgroundMusic ""
Language "English"
